Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Sharae Sunshyne
Reviews.Content: I was scared to purchase his television because it had no reviews at the time, but I glad I did. You can plug up your laptop, tablet, PC, etc. This television is a great buy for a medium size bedroom. If this television comes in a 42 inch or larger, I will purchase it for my living room!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: John Readle
Reviews.Content: This is my second. I bought one a few months back for use a a monitor in my shop. I also watch TV on it. I have been so pleased with this model that I recently purchased another to use watching TV in my bedroom. Great image quality and very good sound. If you want a great monitor or TV, this is for you. If you're one of those "gamer" types, look elsewhere with your checkbook in hand.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: J.F.
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 of these as Christmas presents for my sons and have had no problems with either set.  It's been 6+ monthsPicture quality is great at 720 as it's only a 32'' screen.Both are connected to XBOX 360's for gaming, DVD's and TV watching.Sound quality is not the best, but good enough.  Bought a 32'' Toshiba a year earlier for over $100 more and I see no difference between the two sets.

Reviews.Title: Haier Model L32F1120 Junk!
Reviews.Author: David Feist
Reviews.Content: ...this 32" LCD TV came with my Dutchman travel trailer parched last December, 2012; it has been used less than 6 hours over the course of about 10 months, yesterday the LCD display suddenly and without warning went completely black, including loss of sound.  The blue power light remains on, and can be turned off and on with remote, but no picture!  The Warranty is a standard 1 year parts/90 days labor, which is normally the real cost of a warranty.  Today, I was quoted $150 and up to fix the unit, which is over 50% of a new one, so it is now JUNK!  Do not recommend buying this brand, one star is too gracious to give it!Haier L32F1120 32-Inch 720p LCD HDTV

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE QUALITY BEWARE!!
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv last year for a summer home.  It was used very little for about 2 months.  This year it worked fine until yesterday and suddenly stopped working.  I called customer service and because it was over the one year warranty they would not do anything at all!  The customer service agent would not even allow me to speak to a supervisor to explain the circumstances.  I have never owned a Haier tv before and will NEVER buy another.  This is the only review I have ever submitted on any product but felt the need to do so because of the terrible quality.  BUYER BEWARE. TERRIBLE- TERRIBLE- TERRIBLE!!!!

Reviews.Title: Screen Blacks Out
Reviews.Author: rickster
Reviews.Content: Apparently, my TV lasted longer than most-about 2 years.  Would cost more to get it repaired than it originally cost.  I will now pay the extra $50-$100 to get Samsung quality that will last 10+ years.  Customer service didn't really care & I learned my lesson the hard way.  Have never written a review for a product before this but feel the need to warn potential purchasers.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: philip lang
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this TV; The picture quality and sound are better than I expected. It was light weight and easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Sound is poor, picture quality is great
Reviews.Author: Sekou Murphy
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, but the sound is defective (or bad by design). You might be able to get some really good speakers to plug in, but the increase in cost got me to the combined price of paying for another TV with equal picture quality TV AND good sound (and less hassle). I tried plugging in some old speakers I had, but the sound from the TV doesn't mute out when I plugged in the speakers (i.e., I still got the cheap sound from the TV AND the sound from the speakers).

Reviews.Title: Decent TV
Reviews.Author: Stacy Wilson
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this TV  It has a great picture, lots of nice features and a great price to boot

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Kim Lau
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV 11 months ago. I was skeptical about its brand ... but I gave it a try since it was in promotion for just under $200 (It was really a great price for that size TV by then). I am very happy that I have given it a chance. The picture is crystal sharp! While I do not find any different from other TVs on its sound quality as complained on some reviews. Overall, I think this is a great buy at this time (I don't know if it lasts).

Reviews.Title: Nice Pic
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Cunningham "knt00"
Reviews.Content: The Pic is nice but the sound quality isn't so good but the good part is one I added speaker all was well.

Reviews.Title: sound
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: The volume on this TV is not very loud. The picture quality is good. I Just need speakers to hear it comfortably.

Reviews.Title: TV Broke 10 months in and I've spent 3 months trying to get it fixed or money back-- HAIER customer service- liars!!
Reviews.Author: Michael Mcdonald
Reviews.Content: Bought a HAIER TV in 2011- and the the component input never worked. Lived with that for a while then decided to use the "Warranty" (Warranty is Chinese for "Yeah right-- sucker!!!") Sept. 2012.The repair center (repair center is Chinese for "fake storefront that is never open") was closed when I tried to take the TV in during business hours. They told me they would come pick up the tv twice and neglected to at all over 5 weeks (We haven't had anyone in that neighbourhood they said...). I had to re-register my repair twice and still no show. So I called Haier again who arranged for a replacement. 3 weeks later I'm told that they are out of that TV and I can wait till they make some new ones or, just get a full refund. I opted for the refund because in the meantime, this TV completely quit working.It is now January 16th and no sign of a cheque. I've been told 3 times that it will be there soon- they only cut checks once / month so it can take up to 35 days to receive it. They have had to re-order the check to be cut twice because of "oversight".This product is Garbage and their warranty is useless.It is not worth it to try it out- Google HAIER WARRANTY issues and see that it is their company policy to lie, deceive and attempt to wear down their customers legitimate warranty claims in order to avoid the responsibility (a word which has no equivalent modern chinese translation, apparantly...)

Reviews.Title: POOR PRODUCT AND WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: TRAVEL LADY
Reviews.Content: THIS ITEM ONLY WORKED 3 WEEKS. SCREEN WENT BLACK, HAD POWER BUT NOTHING ELSE. CALLED AND RECEIVED REPAIR ORDER. CAME AND PICKED UP TV, ORDERED PARTS, PARTS DID NOT WORK. HAIER WAS TO CONTACT ME TO REPLACE TV. PROBLEM THIS HAPPENED IN APRIL! CAN'T REACH ANYONE TO TELL ME WHAT IS GOING ON AN HOW THEY ARE GOING TO REPLACE THE TV.  STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT AND THIS COMPANY. DO NOT ADHERE TO CUSTOMER SERVICE.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: smartshopper
Reviews.Content: Bought this in November 2011.  Remote quit working in April 2012.  Called Haier.  Said remote was not part of the warranty of the Haier tv.  If a service person came out and the remote was the problem, I would be charged for service call. I will never buy a Haier product again.
